cp2xPSefKot-tHXS051TJg.text: Brilliant wee place. Lovely gluten fee cake.  Dog friendly !!!!!!!! Even brought water for my lad!  Free wifi.  Great atmosphere.   I will come again.

photos.caption: Photo of Happy Bean Cafe - Edinburgh, United Kingdom

KoDdyA48pO9ScMSdD0Ymvw.text: Almond croissant was tasty, but their cinnamon bun tasted stale (like it was from yesterday).

CqQ54CCaqECbpEWtYN7ptw.text: A solid three stars for Happy Bean. I popped round on my lunch break for some soup and wasn't disappointed. Soup du jour was tomato and basil with a swirl of of sun-dried tomato oil. 1.50 for a good size and with as much free homemade croutons as you fancy.  Service was charming; just enough to tempt me back next time I'm unprepared come lunch at work.  Happy Bean is a warm and unassuming spot, just waiting to be found on Easter Road. Conveniently, my current place of work is just round the corner!

photos.caption: Photo of Happy Bean Cafe - Edinburgh, United Kingdom
